channel.copyright: antuki. Powered by [blogdown](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown)/[Hugo](//gohugo.io). Theme based on Icarus by [PPOffice](http://github.com/ppoffice) with modifications by [antuki](https://antuki.github.io).

item.title: First post full of love :blue_heart: thanks to emojifont package
item.description: A first article to celebrate the creation of this blog thanks to Hugo and blogdown. I can now create posts (in French and / or English) in one click from R. It is also an opportunity to share with you my discovery of the emojifont package which allows to add small images to our ggplots. Thank you @guangchuangyu! #install.packages("emojifont") library(emojifont) ## Warning: le package 'emojifont' a été compilé avec la version R 3.
